entry.title: Split Screen
entry.content:
Looking southwest over Abalone Cove and Portuguese Bend in Rancho Palos Verdes. But you can see an interesting phenomena: the setting sun (way off-screen to the right) is blocked by the incoming fog on the right; yet on the left side the pink glow of sunset is still visible.
